titleStmt.title: A briefe and plaine narration of proceedings at an assemsemblie [sic] in Glasco, 8. Iun. 1610. anent the innovation of the Kirk-governement With a narration of some straunge episcopall accidents lately happened in Scotland, worthie co[n]sideration: which the wise of heart will vnderstand.
Briefe and plaine narration of proceedings at an assemblie in Glasco, 8. Iun. 1610. anent the innovation of the Kirk-governement.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from STC.
With a final leaf of Latin verse.
Running title reads: A brief narration of proceedings at an assemblie in Glasco.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
